Text: Enjoyed meeting youElizabethJust wanted you to know I truly enjoyed meeting you today Thank you for taking the time to learn more about my background and to share your Enron experience with me On reflection I still think Enron is more of a financial company than a tech company techbroadband is just one of Enrons many facets A few years ago I think Enron was having trouble deciding whether it was an energy company or a financial company and settled on the latter to chart its direction I think Enrons innovative processes and approaches to problem solving are what make the prospect of working with you so exciting I am most interested in the available opportunity and look forward to hearing from you soon Alice Ginsburgh
